item.title: Unlocking the Capabilities of Thought: A Reasoning Boundary Framework to Quantify and Optimize Chain-of-Thought
item.description: Reasoning Boundary Framework (RBF) quantitatively assesses and optimizes chain-of-thought (CoT) in LLMs, offering novel metrics and optimization strategies validated across various models and tasks.
